actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT Devices.Barcode, Devices.Type, Output.Assignment, Devices.SN, Devices.Timestamp
FROM Devices
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT Assignments.Barcode, Assignments.Assignment, Assignments.Timestamp
FROM Assignments
INNER JOIN
(SELECT Barcode, max(Timestamp) as Timestamp
FROM `Assignments` 
Where Barcode <> ""
GROUP BY Barcode) as Result
ON Assignments.Timestamp = Result.Timestamp 
 AND Assignments.Barcode = Result.Barcode) as Output
ON Devices.Barcode = Output.Barcode
ORDER BY Barcode DESC
